title: Shake Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Italian, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A gelateria/cafe offers choices for vegans, including a tofu salad, tofu sandwich, sorbet, gelato and soy milk for hot drinks. A 5 minute walk from Santa Maria Novella railway station.
streetAddress: Via Degli Avelli 2R, Piazza Santa Maria Novella
